head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KLERSFELD, SYLVIA H. (NEE SALKOW)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KLERSFELD, SYLVIA H. (NEE SALKOW)

block.p: KLERSFELD-Sylvia H. (nee Salkow). On May 30, 2000. Beloved wife of Dr. Bernard M. Klersfeld. Devoted mother of Lawrence Kamin, Samuel Kamin and Janet Kamin. Cherished grandmother of Rebecca, Diana, John, Madeline and Paul. Services Friday, 9:30AM at ''Riverside-Nassau North Chapels'' 55 North Station Plaza (opposite LIRR), Great Neck, NY.
